title: 5th Grade Teacher - Full Time
status: Full Time, 1 FTEMinimum Requirements:Active Utah Early ChildhoodorElementary Teaching License. ESL Endorsement beneficial, but not required.The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.WCSD will recognize no more than thirteen full time, complete years of previous teaching experience when placing on the TT Salary Schedule.
